snippet: Issues like domestic abuse didn’t seem to impinge on Giants fans’ eager expectation of a game against the Cardinals at MetLife Stadium.
abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column asserts that NFL fans seem to forget players' misdeeds when it comes to game time.
lead_paragraph: Issues like domestic abuse didn’t seem to impinge on Giants fans’ eager expectation of a game against the Cardinals at MetLife Stadium.

headline.main: To N.F.L. Fans, the Sport’s Troubles Vanish Between the Lines
headline.print_headline: To N.F.L. Fans, the Sport’s Troubles Vanish Between the Lines
